cmput301w18t09.orbid

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w18t09.orbid.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    A model representation of a task made by a task provider and to be completed by a task provider.
    See Also:
    Bid

      • compareTasks

        public static boolean compareTasks(Task t1,
                                   Task t2)
        Compares two tasks to see if they are equals. Only works for tasks that have not yet been placed on the server and subsequently received a unique ID.
        Parameters:
        t1 - The first task to compare against
        t2 - The second task to compare against
        Returns:
        True if the tasks are the same
